name: Aviation Professionals Incorporated
about: Aviation Professionals Incorporated, established in 1971, is one of the oldest and most reputable flight schools in the United States. With over 50 years of experience, we specialize in training individuals to become certified FAA Private Pilots, as well as offering Commercial Pilot and Flight Instructor certifications. Our school, located at Chicago Midway Airport, is a designated FAA Testing Center for pilots and drone pilots. Under the leadership of Bill S., who has over 30 years of experience in aviation, we have developed comprehensive and consistent lesson plans that ensure productive and effective training. We pride ourselves on our commitment to student care, providing a comfortable and supportive learning environment. Our instructors are dedicated to making every flight productive, often going the extra mile to prepare aircraft for early morning flights. We invite you to join our community of aviation professionals and start your journey to becoming a certified pilot.
